nodes.text: The diluted version of Toniray was the less-intoxicating cousin of Toniray, and was nearly identical in color. At dinner parties where sensitive information was being discussed, Breha Organa sometimes had real Toniray served only to specific guests, such as Grand Moff Tarkin, with the rest served the less-alcoholic duplicate, which was more juice than intoxicant. The two were similar enough in color that only a few could tell the difference.
